thought: To craft 4 polished_granite_stairs, I need to place 3 polished_granite blocks in the first column of the crafting table, with the first block in the bottom left slot. The polished_granite blocks are located at slot 41, so I will move one of them to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 1 with quantity 1
